description: Centralized knowledge base index for cross-project Minecraft modding research

entries.title: Minecraft Villager System
entries.summary: Complete documentation of villager profession textures, brain AI system, bed claiming mechanics, and Point of Interest system for Minecraft 1.21.1

entries.title: Performance Profiling and Analysis Tools
entries.summary: Comprehensive comparison of performance analysis tools for Minecraft development including Spark, JProfiler, JMH, and Fabric-specific optimization mods

entries.title: Porting Mods from Forge/NeoForge to Fabric
entries.summary: Complete guide for porting mods from Forge/NeoForge to Fabric, covering entity systems, registration patterns, animation library migration (Citadel to GeckoLib), and common pitfalls

entries.title: Alex's Mobs - Complete Mob Reference Catalog
entries.summary: Complete reference catalog of 92 creatures from Alex's Mobs v1.22.9 with textures, sounds, animations, asset requirements, complexity tiers, and porting effort estimates for entity-heavy mod projects
